mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspAbTest Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ AB_TEST_SN , PROGRS_PSB_YN , SET_USE_YN , SET_EXPSR_MENMTHD_CD , AB_TEST_NM , AB_TEST_DSCR , BEG_DT , END_DT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_AB_TEST WHERE 1 = 1 AND AB_TEST_SN = #{abTestSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteDspAbTest Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM DSP_AB_TEST WHERE 1 = 1 AND AB_TEST_SN = #{abTestSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
